ICDSEngineBackend
public class CBackend
extends AbstractCDSEngineBackend

CDSEngineBackend implementation that generates pure C code.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

type

public void type(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                 CType ctype,
                 java.lang.Class<? extends CType> clazz)
Generates type definitions of the given class.

Parameters:
cdsFile - The cdsFile to write the type defs to.
ctype - The CType to write.
clazz - The class or one of its super classes of the CType object to write.
Since:
2008.b

typedIdentifier

public void typedIdentifier(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                            CType var)
                     throws CDSGenAPIException
Generates the typed identifier of a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile. This method doesn't care if the type of the variable has already been defined or not.

Parameters:
cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
var - The variable to generate the identifier for.
Throws:
CDSGenAPIException - in case of an public API error
Since:
13.0

initializer

public void initializer(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                        CType var,
                        java.lang.String lineTerminator)
                 throws CDSGenAPIException
Generates the initializer for the variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile. This method doesn't care if the type of the variable has already been defined or not.

Parameters:
cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
var - The variable to generate the identifier for.
lineTerminator - A string that is appended to each generated line prior to the newline character
Throws:
CDSGenAPIException - in case of an public API error
Since:
13.0

var

public void var(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                CType var)
         throws CDSGenAPIException
Generates a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile. This method doesn't care if the type of the variable has already been defined or not.

Parameters:
cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
var - The variable to write.
Throws:
CDSGenAPIException - in case of an public API error
Since:
2008.b
